titleStmt.title: Die Lunæ 4. Martii 1643. An ordinance for the regulating of the rates on the customes and excise of tobacco.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Cotes, and John Raworth,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1643."; the second 4 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
